metadata.name: Baddie #8071
metadata.description: Baddies NFT is a collection of 8,765 diverse women in the Metaverse, generated from 137 possible traits and 8 hand drawn baddies by a baddie herself with references from pop culture, mystical beings, anime, movies and fashion. The collection focuses on badass women who are soft yet proud, fierce and unapologetic. The baddies aim to make broken look beautiful and strong look invincible in a digital universe.
